solution_line_template: The total amount of seeds used in the planting zones is {seeds_per_zone} x {num_planting_zones} = <<{seeds_per_zone}*{num_planting_zones}={total_seeds_used}>>{total_seeds_used}.
The total amount of seeds left after planting is {initial_seeds} - {total_seeds_used} = <<{initial_seeds}-{total_seeds_used}={remaining_seeds}>>{remaining_seeds}.
